subject: Soccer
Women
lead_paragraph: Mia Hamm and her longtime teammate Julie Foudy will be inducted into the National Soccer Hall of Fame today in Oneonta, N.Y. Hamm and Foudy, along with Kristine Lilly, Brandi Chastain and Joy Fawcett, were the Fab Five nucleus of the United States team that won the Women’s World Cup in 1991 and 1999. They also won gold medals at the 1996 and 2004 Olympics.
